title: Once-in-a-Lifetime Underwater Pullman Maldives Villa with Unlimited Premium Drinks & Dining
description:
Be submerged in all-inclusive Pullman Maldives luxury like never before with this utterly unique and exhilarating stay amid the deep blue of the Indian Ocean. Experience barefoot Pullman luxury above the turquoise waves with unlimited all-inclusive dining across six outlets and premium drinks, including an 80-variety ‘wine wall’, before diving beneath it and entering the enchanting underwater realm of magical sea life, exotic corals and refined grandeur of an Aqua Villa.

One of just a handful of submerged villas in the world, Pullman Maldives Maamutaa's two secluded Aqua Villas invite you to wake to swaying corals and darting fish, while lapping up every conceivable luxury with an above-water second storey where you can watch the sunset melt into the horizon.
offer_address: Maamutaa Island, Gaafu Alifu Atoll, 20219 Maldives

title: Luxurious Pullman Maldives Haven with Gourmet Restaurants, Wellness Spa & Dive Sites
description:
Embrace barefoot luxury at this five-star Maldives hideaway surrounded by pristine coral sands, crystal-clear waters and vibrant marine life. Unwind in total seclusion within this hidden oasis, featuring six dining venues and the Pullman Spa by Phytomer which offers a dazzling range of world-class treatments, ranging from aromatherapy massages to seaweed wraps in a gorgeous overwater setting.

Make the most of your time in paradise with an array of activities to choose from. You might like to snorkel along the coral reef, take a sunset cruise or zip across the ocean on a jet ski. With dazzling white sand and breathtaking views of the shimmering Indian Ocean, Pullman Maldives Maamutaa is one of the most indulgent escapes you’ll ever take.
offer_address: Gaafu Alifu Atoll, 20219, Maamutaa Island, Maldives
